items.question: Will there be a sequel?
items.answer: On July 24, 2018, Bird mentioned on a Twitter post that a sequel to the film will never be made.

items.question: Why is this film not list in IMDb's Top 250 Movies?
items.answer: It is now (September 2022) on the IMDb's Top 250 Movies. Number 250 as per Sept. 3rd.

items.question: Are there other Iron Giants besides the one featured in the movie?
items.answer: Yes, in a deleted story board scene hints that the Iron Giant isn't the only one of its kind. When the Giant starts to sleep, his "dream" is transmitted to Dean's TV which shows brief footage of other Iron Giants.However in the "Signature Edition" released in 2015, it is implied that the Iron Giant is the last of his kind, his planet having been destroyed by the war for which he was presumably created.
